title: A 2-Person Game Decomposing 2-Manifolds
authors: David R. Berman, Lee O. Leonard
abstract:
Two players play a game by alternately splitting a surface of a compact
$2$-manifold along a simple closed curve that is not null-homotopic and
attaching disks to the resulting boundary; the last player who can move wins.
Starting from an orientable surface, the $G$-series is $01\dot{2}\dot{0}$
according to increasing genus. Starting from a nonorientable surface, the
$G$-series is $012\dot{4}60\dot{3}$ according to increasing genus. Nim addition
determines the $G$-values of the remaining compact $2$-manifolds.
